arts.ttl: Arsenal transfer latest: Mikel Arteta suffers blow as top striker target set to be offered new deal
arts.sum: Arsenal reportedly suffer a blow in their pursuit of one of their priority targets in the forward line, with their transfer market options up front shrinking.
Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta praises the "unbelievable spirit" of his side after their 1-0 Premier League win over Wolves at Molineux despite playing with 10 men for over half the game.

arts.ttl: Wolves 0-1 Arsenal: Vitor Pereira rueful of failure to defeat 10-man Gunners
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers head coach Vitor Pereira admits that his players 'wasted a big chance' to defeat Arsenal, ultimately losing 1-0 to their 10-men opponents.

arts.ttl: Arsenal overcome controversial Myles Lewis-Skelly red card to edge out Wolves
arts.sum: Riccardo Calafiori scored the only goal of the game in the 74th minute.

arts.ttl: Matheus Cunha ‘not for sale’ amid Arsenal and Forest transfer interest
arts.sum: Matheus Cunha won’t be sold in the January transfer window despite being linked with moves to Arsenal and Nottingham Forest, Wolves boss Vitor Pereira has said. The Brazil international has been a standout performer on a poor Wanderers team this season, recording 10 goals and four assists in 21 Premier League appearances. arts.ttl: Fabio Silva plays Las Palmas peace maker as teammate loses the rag in red card ref rant
arts.sum: The former Rangers loanee's form has seen him linked with Atletico Madrid this window

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Ipswich Town - Premier League: Live score, team news and updates as the League leaders look to secure another win in their bid for the title plus updates from the other 3pm games
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates from all of Saturday's 3pm games including Liverpool vs Ipswich Town and Wolves vs Arsenal.

arts.ttl: ‘Much higher than €25m’ – Wolves told they need off-market offer to have any chance
arts.sum: Real Betis’ Johnny Cardoso has been linked with a move to Wolverhampton Wanderers in the winter market. Saturday’s editions of ABC Sevilla and Mundo Deportivo have looked at Wolves’ chances of securing the midfielder’s services. The newspaper local to the La Liga side state Real Betis will not open the exit door for the 23-year-old The post ‘Much higher than €25m’ – Wolves told they need off-market offer to have any chance appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: How to watch Wolves vs Arsenal
arts.sum: Wolves vs Arsenal kicks off at 3pm with the Matchday Live stream beginning around 30 minutes ahead of kick-off at 2.30pm. Live text coverage of Wolves vs Arsenal is also being provided on Saturday afternoon as wolves.co.uk returns with the Matchday Blog, beginning two hours ahead of kick-off.

arts.ttl: Arsenal XI vs Wolves – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Arsenal head to Wolves in the Premier League this weekend with three points the sole objective. The Gunners lost ground on leaders Liverpool last weekend after blowing a two-goal lead to draw with Aston Villa.
